short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality settings on Youtube videos will be defaulted to the highest quality possible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube's auto quality feature doesn't always give the quality for the best user experience. This extension automatically sets the quality closest to the user's preferred quality for each video. Code publicly available in the Github repo.

Release Log
---
v0.3 - Add option to select preferred quality
v0.2 - Fix bug when entering from youtube.com
v0.1 - Initial release

This extension was written to only require permissions on youtube.com to limit intruding privacy.
